pages.text: Most of the resources added to the game are derived from ores. These mineral depositions occur throughout various stones and dimensions.

The Overworld has 3 major regions of ore differentiation. From about y-level 50 to 75 are the top layers, which hosts all of the harvest level 0 ores. The middle layers are from about y-level 25 to 50 and are host to the majority of the common metals. The bottom layers are below y-level  30 and contain more precious metals and gems.
$(l)Harvest Level:$() 0 $(br)$(l)Location:$() Top layers of the Overworld $(br)$(l)Usage:$() Mine to yield copper nuggets.
